description:
An intensive introductory laboratory course in organismal biology. 

BIOL 124 is the companion course to BIOL 121 and may be taken before or after BIOL 121. Students may not take both BIOL 102 and 124 for credit. 

Lab fee $150.
name: INTRO ORGANISM BIOL. LAB

values.comments:
BIOL 124 is an intensive introductory laboratory course in organismal biology.
Many students felt that this course was broad and covered many different topics.
Several students wished there had been time to go deeper into the material. Opinions
varied on the usefulness of lectures, but students agreed that dissections were a definite
highlight.
Students seemed to thoroughly enjoy Professor Robinson’s teaching. Several
commented on the benefits of the videos and real-world examples she integrated into
lecture.
This class is a smaller lab class. Some students found the grading to be a bit
harsh, and most disliked the pop quizzes.
